dmca.title: TOS Violation
dmca.body:
Hello,
 
I am writing to you in regards to a TOS violation at the site: http://slam.qlogger.com
 
I belong to a private message board at another site, and the person who maintains slam.qlogger.com has stalked it, infiltrated it, copied private information from it, and then posted it on slam.qlogger.com and used it to harass us.
 
Not only that, but this person changed some of the information from what they copied, in order to suit their agenda and make the participants of the message board look as bad as possible.  I do believe this is libel and I will be talking with a lawyer about it.
 
I hope that this site will be removed as soon as possible, seeing as it blatantly violates these sections of your TOS:
 
"You agree to not use the Service to: 

a. upload, post, email, transmit or otherwise make available any Content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically or otherwise objectionable; "

"j. "stalk" or otherwise harass another; or "
 
Thanks for your time.
